name: updateDoc
description: Update a doc with this slug

slug.description: Slug of doc. must be lowercase, and replace spaces with hyphens. For example, for the page titled "New Features", enter the slug "new-features"

x-readme-version.description: Version number of your docs project, for example, v3.0. To see all valid versions for your docs project call https://docs.readme.com/developers/reference/version#getversions.
